plot: Two journalists marry but the husband grows unhappy when he is left to take care of their child and she focuses on her career.
title: Du är mitt äventyr
plot_es: Two journalists marry but the husband grows unhappy when he is left to take care of their child and she focuses on her career.
plot_en: Two journalists marry but the husband grows unhappy when he is left to take care of their child and she focuses on her career.
